title: The Elgin Marbles or The Parthenon Sculptures: what is the solution?
description:
How can we justify keeping the Elgin marbles in the British Museum? Join The Spectatorâ€™s James Forsyth and special guests as they discuss how to bring an end to the Parthenon Sculptures dispute.
